thread.title: Liverpool confirm why Jordan Henderson misses Leicester City clash | Metro News
thread.title_full: Liverpool confirm why Jordan Henderson misses Leicester City clash | Metro News

author: Chris Davie For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Liverpool confirm why Jordan Henderson misses Leicester City clash | Metro News
text:
Chris Davie for Metro.co.uk Monday 27 Feb 2017 7:17 pm Jordan Henderson misses Liverpool’s clash with a foot injury. (Getty Images) 
Liverpool have confirmed that Jordan Henderson misses Monday’s clash with Leicester City due to a foot injury. 
The Liverpool captain suffered a bruised foot during Friday’s training session and did not travel for the clash against the Premier League champions. 
Jurgen Klopp has only made one change from his side’s 2-0 victory over Tottenham at Anfield 16 days ago as Henderson is replaced by Emre Can. 
Henderson is also a doubt for Liverpool’s crucial fixture against Arsenal this Saturday. 
Captain Jordan Henderson is ruled out of this evening's game due to a foot injury. —
